show.title: The Hidden King
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/FGN6Yz
show.description: A gripping thriller about RA&W officer Sher Pathan, who deliberately lands himself inside one of the country’s most dangerous prisons. Haunted by the mysterious death of his sister Dr. Roshini, he enters a brutal world ruled by corrupt warden Rathod, feared inmate Shera, and hidden alliances. With the help of conflicted prison doctor Kavya and the quiet but loyal Dhaval, Aarav inches closer to a dark truth. But behind bars, every ally is a risk, and every secret could kill. In this prison, justice isn't blind… it's buried.
